projects.name: Smart Home Automation using LoRa
projects.description: This project implements a smart home automation system leveraging LoRa (Long Range) wireless technology to enable low-power, long-distance communication between home devices and a centralized controller. The system allows users to remotely monitor and control appliances (such as lights, fans, and security sensors) via a user-friendly dashboard or mobile interface, ensuring reliable automation even in areas with limited internet connectivity.

projects.name: RACPad Enterprice application
projects.description: RACPAD is an enterprise-grade web application designed to streamline product lifecycle management for Rent-A-Center. The platform facilitates centralized administration of product data, including inventory tracking, pricing updates, availability configurations, and compliance checks. Built with a scalable microservices architecture, RACPAD enhances operational efficiency by enabling seamless integration with existing business systems such as ERP and CRM modules.
